name: stitching
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a line or lines of thread that has been sewn in something: The stitching along my coat hem is coming undone. The fancy stitching on the jacket is unusual.
the activity of sewing individual threads in something: She’d been trained to do embroidery and hand stitching. The cloth-making, cutting and stitching is done by others. See
stitch
More examplesFewer examplesThe materials and stitching are of high quality.Examine the top stitching on lapels and pockets to see if it is well done. Join us for an evening of stitching and eating cake.Companies have to extend their range of skills from just sewing and stitching.
